blocks.content_html:
Navigation

Unreal Engine C++ API Reference > Plugins > ColorCorrectRegions

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • AActor
  • IDisplayClusterStageActor
  • AColorCorrectRegion
  • AColorCorrectionRegion
  • AColorCorrectionWindow
  • ADEPRECATED_ColorCorrectWindow

References

   
Module ColorCorrectRegions
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/ColorCorrectRegions/Source/ColorCorrectRegions/Public/ColorCorrectRegion.h
Include #include "ColorCorrectRegion.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (Blueprintable, NotPlaceable, Abstract,  
       HideCategories=(Actor, HLOD, Collision, Replication, Cooking, Input, DataLayers, Physics, Streaming, WorldPartition))  
class AColorCorrectRegion :  
    public AActor,  
    public IDisplayClusterStageActor

Remarks

An instance of Color Correction Region. Used to aggregate all active regions. This actor is aggregated by ColorCorrectRegionsSubsystem on Tick. AActor class itself is not aware of when it is added/removed, Undo/Redo etc in the Editor. More information in ColorCorrectRegionsSubsytem.h

Variables

  Type Name Description
TSet< TSoftObjectPtr< AActor > > AffectedActors List of actors that get affected or ignored by Per actor CC. Effect depends on the above option.
bool bEnablePerActorCC Enables or disabled per actor color correction.
bool bNotifyOnParamSetter Update the transform when a positional setter is called.
FColorGradingSettings ColorGradingSettings Color correction settings.
bool Enabled Enable/Disable color correction provided by this region.
float Falloff Falloff. Softening the region.
TObjectPtr< UColorCorrectionInvisibleComponent > IdentityComponent The main purpose of this component is to determine the visibility status of this Color Correction Actor.
float Inner Inner of the region. Swapped with Outer in case it is higher than Outer.
float Intensity Color correction intensity. Clamped to 0-1 range.
bool Invert Invert region.
TArray< TObjectPtr< UStaticMeshComponent > > MeshComponents  
FTransform Origin The origin when used in the ICVFX panel.
float Outer Outer of the region.
EColorCorrectRegionStencilType PerActorColorCorrection Controls in which way the below targets will be affected by color correction.
TMap< TSoftObjectPtr< AActor >, TSharedPtr< FStencilData > > PerAffectedActorStencilData This is a temporary property that is used to keep track of managed actors for per actor CC.
FDisplayClusterPositionalParams PositionalParams Spherical coordinates in relation to the origin, primarily used with the ICVFX panel.
int32 Priority Render priority/order.
TObjectPtr< UBillboardComponent > SpriteComponent Billboard component for this actor.
float Temperature Color correction temperature.
EColorCorrectRegionTemperatureType TemperatureType Type of algorithm to be used to control color temperature or white balance.
float Tint Color temperature tint.
EColorCorrectRegionsType Type Region type.
